teslas.subtitle: The quickest accelaration on earth
teslas.info: Tesla's all electric powertrain delivers unparalleled performance in all weather conditions with Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive and ludicrous acceleration.

teslas.subtitle: Made with simplicity
teslas.info: Tesla's most affordable car, with an acceleration of 0 to 60 in as little as 3.2 seconds. Improved handling and aerodynamics allow for a top speed of 162 mph.
